pl.bristleback.server.bristle.conf

Class EngineConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.bristleback.server.bristle.conf.EngineConfig

  • public class EngineConfig
extends Object
    Configuration of the Websocket engine, used by ServerEngine implementations. Note that each field usage may be dependent on websocket engine implementations. For example, port configuration property is not used in web server implementations (engines implementing ServletServerEngine interface).

    Created on: 2011-07-03 23:36:15

    Author:
    Wojciech Niemiec
